data.name: RPGScenery - Grassland Scene
data.detailed_description:
The valley, which stretches between huge mountains, is covered with dense tall grass that ripples in the wind like the sea. Its sheer monotony is often broken by a grove of cedar trees. Dusty dirt roads between the groves indicate where to go. In the middle of the valley there are two gigantic statue ruins, quietly waiting the end of time.

This DLC contains 6 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level
